metadata.title: CVE-2018-10126 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: LibTIFF 4.0.9 has a NULL pointer dereference in the jpeg_fdct_16x16 function in jfdctint.c.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2021-09-13, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: tiff package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-09-13').
